channel.title: Can someone help me?
channel.description:
My friend got a server. And wanted me to put it on mopar status page.
But because my ip isnt the same as his, i couldnt add it. Is there a way to solve this? :(
Tried it yesterday, but i have no idea how to solve. Except maybe let him add it on my acc.

item.title: Can someone help me?
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:5, topic:485964”][quote author=rossy319 link=topic=604196.msg4224067#msg4224067 date=1360931363]
This is fairly stupid because it shows both you and your friend have 0 common sense.

Although you can’t add it yourself, you can use his computer through “TeamViewer” and set it up for him.
Also wrong section :fp:
[/quote]
I know, and where shoul i have posted this?
There is no section im allowed to post something like this…[/quote]

That’s because mostly people try do things like this, and not begging for help… Or using common sense or at least Google if brains are not installed…

Read full topic
